alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...CLUSTER OF DEVELOPING THUNDERSTORMS LIFTING NORTHEAST THROUGH THE SNAKE RIVER PLAIN AND SOUTHEAST MOUNTAINS THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, radar indicated thunderstorms developing along a line extending from 12 miles north of Minidoka to near American Falls to near the Portneuf Gap to Virginia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, lightning, and brief moderate showers. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, McCammon, Lava Hot Springs, Neeley, Chesterfield Reservoir, Blackfoot Reservoir, American Falls Reservoir, Goshen, northern Lake Walcott, Chubbuck, Aberdeen, Inkom, Arimo, Rockland, Minidoka, Pingree, Fort Hall Putnam Lodge and Cold Water Rest Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Shoshone, Lava Beds
